item.description:
This will be a normal study group, but will meet at Staropolska Restaurant instead of the Courtyard Marriot!Â Members learn and speak Russian amongst other members. Study material is provided, but your more than welcome to suggest topics to study. Are you a member who's not attended a meeting yet? Come to this one. It's a great chance for new members and old members alike to meet and enjoy conversation about Russian
language and culture. Our group embraces all language levels, from beginner to native speaker. Don't miss this special event!

group.name: The Hartford Russian Language Meetup Group

item.name: Study Group
